name: infra

scripts.lambda-build-check-kb: cd lib/lambda/check-kb-status-handler && npm install && npm run build
scripts.lambda-build-cleanup-kb: cd lib/lambda/cleanup-kb-handler && npm install && npm run build
scripts.lambda-build-query-kb: cd lib/lambda/query-kb-handler && npm install && npm run build
scripts.lambda-build-project-files: cd lib/lambda/project-files-handler && npm install && npm run build
scripts.lambda-build-projects: cd lib/lambda/projects-handler && npm install && npm run build
scripts.lambda-build: npm run lambda-build-projects && npm run lambda-build-project-files && npm run lambda-build-query-kb && npm run lambda-build-cleanup-kb && npm run lambda-build-check-kb
scripts.deploy: npm run lambda-build && cdk synth && cdk deploy --require-approval never --all --outputs-file ../cdk-outputs.json

description: This is a blank project for CDK development with TypeScript.
